sys_remote_update_set.description:
VDI Request Form The new computer form will change as follows: 1. A new option named VDI will be added to Select computer type 2. When VDI is selected, the application suite question will be removed 3. The following questions will be added a. Please select a data center (options will be EDC and WDC) b. Please select a use case (Standard, Toolkit, Developer) c. Do you already have an RSA token? (Yes/No) d. Do you need a client or will you be using your computer (Zero Client, Linux Client, Computer) e. Business justification (multi-line text)
Once submitted the workflow will go as follows 1. Approval task to user's manager 2. Approval task to VA - Virtualization - VDI group 3. Task to assign RSA token (to user's Helpdesk) 4. Task to add user to appropriate RSA security groups (to user's Helpdesk) 5. Task for physical client setup (if selected) (to VA - End User Computing) 6. Task for VDI Creation 7. Task for VDI Entitlement (including updating the cmdb owner info with the user's info) 8. Email with documentation ,KB Articles, and links to requests for additional software to user
sys_remote_update_set.name: JL/GP - STRY0013246 - VDI Request Form
